bug.author: eric-haibin-lin
bug.summary: Incorrect install from source instructions on gluonnlp website
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/master/install/install-more.html>https://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/master/install/install-more.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>pip install --pre --upgrade mxnet git clone https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp cd gluon-nlp && python setup.py install --user </denchmark-code>
This does not clone the master branch of gluonnlp. The MXNet version is also not up-to-date
